title: G-Ahora Anime Kitty Water Bottle,Kawaii Anime Water Bottle Cup,Reusable Water Bottle for Girls 500ml (Cinnam)
features: 【ANIME DESIGN】 This is anime kitty water bottle, a perfect gift for any fan of KT cat.You can choose which character or pattern you like.

【304 STAINLESS STEEL】 This bottle is made of 304 stainless steel, which is corrosion-resistant and safe for health.It reaches FDA standards for food-grade contact use.You don't have to worry about leaks, it's double insulated.Not only makes the sealing is very good, but also can make the water in the bottle to keep warm for more time, up to 12 hours of warmth or cold.

【Durable and Portable】 The bottle cap has a convenient button design.You need to gently press and the bottle cap will open, which makes your use experience very convenient and helps to prevent against spills.The water bottle separates into two parts making it super easy to clean.
【LARGE CAPACITY of 500ml】 With 500ml/17oz capacity and size of 21*6cm(8.26*2.36 inch).It can meet your different needs, including outdoor activities, school, cars, etc...

【SUITABLE FOR MANY APPLICATIONS】 The anime water bottle can be used at home, work, school, outdoor sports, at the gym, in your car, at the beach and camping or hiking.Practical and durable, for those who like anime, this is undoubtedly a very interesting gift, which can be used as a birthday gift, Christmas gift, Thanksgiving gift, Easter gift, etc.
